If you love mind games with a little story, just buy it. It's not like any other puzzle games, you really have to work your brain. Also AI conversations are great, jokes are good. Valve did a good job.

Cara, jogo impossivel de se descrever a qualidade. MUUUUUUITO BOM, esse por ser um jogo puzzle, precisa-se de paciencia e ao ir passando as fases dá pra se perceber que há uma história que acaba te envolvendo, um tanto quanto macabra...
Um dos melhores jogos que ja joguem na minha vida, TOP. O final é engracado e ao  mesmo tempo triste, quase chorei..rs
JOGO MTTTTT BOM, SUPER RECOMENDO

Not as good puzzle wise as portal 1 because the levels are sometimes too cluttered. It seems like they focus-tested a bit much (ZP) 

But it's really good, and longer than the first game so still far better than most games.

The game is...complicated, When I first played this game everything was fine, However my slow decent into alcoholism started quite early. When the game no longer held my hand through the levels I had no idea what to do and slowly went crazy. I tried the co-op but it ruined all relationships I ever had, I lost all of my friends and my wife left me saying I was a changed man. I no longer see the kids any more but that is ok because all I need to do is test for science. I no longer drink coffee I snort the grounds to get that caffeine boost going just so I can play more levels, I have no more money any more but only to pay electricity bills to continue to play Portal 2. This game is great 10/10 IGN would play again.
Possibly the best game ever made.
Fun to play with friends even if the game is old and stale it pushes you to use your brain to solve the puzzles

What happens if you squeeze yourself between an orange portal and a blue portal? Are you crushed? Do you portal inside of yourself? Do you portal into the 6th dimension? All these questions and more answered in this edition of Distorted Space 2: Orange and Blue!
Just try to be a clever superhero
beatiful game it runs very smooth on even a low end computer like mine and has amazing control over what your character does

Um zu verstehen wie überrascht ich von diesem Spiel bin, muss ich zunächst erklären, dass ich kein Freund von Strategie- oder Rätselspielen bin. In meiner Natur liegt eher Kreativität und spontanes agieren. Trotzdem habe ich mir Portal und Portal 2 gekauft, da an diesen Bewertungen doch etwas dran sein muss. 

Long Story short - Das Spiel ist ein überaus würdiger Nachfolger des ersten Teils. Die Story ist unfassbar gut, die Mechaniken funktionieren noch besser und die Atmosphäre ist atemberaubend. Ich habe lediglich den Singleplayer durchgespielt und kann allein deshalb schon eine Empfehlung aussprechen.
Ich bin so immens positiv überrascht von diesem Spiel, dass ich es glatt zu den besten Spielen zählen möchte, die ich je gespielt habe. Absolute, ehrliche Kaufempfehlung!

Wahałem się czy kupić tego Portala czy nie... nigdy wcześniej nie miałem okazji w to grać i sumie nie chciałem. Namówił mnie kolega na co-op i gra okazała się świetna. Jeśli gracie ze znajomym jest mnóstwo zabawy, jak za 2 euro (na summer sale) to zdecydowanie polecam. Nawet się nie zastanawiać tylko brać.

Gayet eğlenceli bir bulmaca oyunu. İlk oyunun üzerine oldukça güzel eklentiler yapmakla kalmayıp senaryo ve genel diyalog kalitesi açısından çok az oyun Portal 2 ile yarışabilir. Normalde bulmaca oyunlarını sevmeseniz bile singleplayer modunu denemenizi, ardından bir arkadaşınızı da oyunu almaya ikna edip co-op moduna da bir şans verin, en az ana oyun kadar başarılı; hem bölüm dizaynı hem de hikaye bakımından. Herkesin oynaması gereken bir oyun.
really good game! worth to buy

Ce jeu est super il est beaucoup mieux que portal 1 ( que je trouve vraiment nul apr rapport à son prix et à portal 2).
Je conseille d'acheter ce jeu si vous aimez les égnimes d'espace. Le seul souci est le boss de fin qui n'est pas extra.
